title: HireUp – Job Portal Platform
description: A full-stack job portal with job search, saved jobs, user profiles, employer dashboards, and secure role-based authentication.

title: Craftly – AI-Powered UI Component Generator
description: An AI tool that generates responsive UI components from text prompts with live preview, editor, dark mode, and multi-framework output.

title: Biblosphere – Book Marketplace
description: A full-stack Java-based book marketplace with user authentication, CRUD operations, search filters, order management, and Razorpay payment.
